title: ComfyUI Hunyuan 1.5 Video
description: Image-to-video generation using Hunyuan 1.5 Video models in ComfyUI. Generate high-quality videos from single images with customizable parameters.

input.name: UNet Model URL
input.description: Direct download URL for Hunyuan Video UNet model (optional if using network volume)

input.name: VAE Model URL
input.description: Direct download URL for VAE model (optional if using network volume)

input.name: CLIP 1 Model URL
input.description: Direct download URL for Qwen CLIP model (optional if using network volume)

input.name: CLIP 2 Model URL
input.description: Direct download URL for ByT5 CLIP model (optional if using network volume)

input.name: CLIP Vision Model URL
input.description: Direct download URL for CLIP Vision model (optional if using network volume)
